name: Welcome to the Dress-Up of the Real
name_original: Welcome to the Dress-Up of the Real
description:
This is a game about playing dress-up with famed philosopher Slavoj Žižek. 

When you download this game you will receive a Windows, Mac, and Linux version of the game as well as the "soundtrack" for the game.

It is a free game, but you have the option of donating money to the developers. 

This will allow us to keep making weird stuff like this.

Designed and developed by CMRN KNZLMN

Art and design by James Wragg

Music by Chris Hunt

This game was produced by MICROMOLAR

You can play the browser version here.
